## form
### Checklist_COM
``` js
import { Checklist } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | form value |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | title |
| <span class="prop-key">required</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if required |
| <span class="prop-key">options</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | option list |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | max selected number |
| <span class="prop-key">min</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | min selected number |
| <span class="prop-key">random-order</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if shuffing options |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   (value) | emits when value changes |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/checklist">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认不显示错误，你可以监听on-error事件结合slot进行处理和显示</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加插槽 footer、after-title</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  如果已经达到max上限，没有选中的选项将不能选择，因此不再和之前版本一样会出现最多可选max个的error信息</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认 required 值为false, 与html规范一致</span></li></ul>

``` js
import { Datetime } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">format</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | YYYY-MM-DD | date format |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | cell title |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | form's value, use `v-model` for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">inline-desc</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | description of the cell |
| <span class="prop-key">placeholder</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | placeholder |
| <span class="prop-key">min-year</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | min-year of the form |
| <span class="prop-key">max-year</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | max-year of the form |
| <span class="prop-key">confirm-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | ok(确认) | confirm button's text |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | cancel(取消) | cancel button's text |
| <span class="prop-key">clear-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | custom button's text which shows in the middle of the header |
| <span class="prop-key">year-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | render template for the year column |
| <span class="prop-key">month-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | render template for the month column |
| <span class="prop-key">day-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | render template for the day column |
| <span class="prop-key">hour-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | render template for the hour column |
| <span class="prop-key">minute-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | render template for the minute column |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   `(value)` | $emits when value changes, `(newVal)` |

### Group_COM
``` js
import { Group } from 'vux'
```

`Group` is a special component for wrapping form elements

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | group title |
| <span class="prop-key">titleColor</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | group title's color |
| <span class="prop-key">labelWidth</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | common label width for child components |
| <span class="prop-key">labelAlign</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | common label text-align for child components |
| <span class="prop-key">labelMarginRight</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | common margin right value for child components |
| <span class="prop-key">gutter</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | set the marginTop value when there is no title |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | content body for child components |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/group">进入demo页面</a>

<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加 `novalidate` 及 `iconType` 可以禁用组件验证，手动显示 error 或者 success 样式</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  `is-type` 支持传入函数</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  受限于vue2不能动态设置type，目前`type`支持 text password number email</span></li></ul>

<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  fillable 值默认为false, 稍微保护一下不小心商城的后端接口没有做好数据校验的用户，导致用户粘贴负数还提交正确</span></li></ul>

### XSwitch_COM
``` js
import { XSwitch } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | label text |
| <span class="prop-key">disabled</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if disabled |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | component's value, use v-model for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">inline-desc</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | text below label |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   `(value)` | triggers when value change, params is (currentValue) |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/x-switch">进入demo页面</a>
